mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member values (seq_member.nextval, #{mid}, #{mname}, #{pwd}, #{phone}, #{addr}, #{mprofile}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{favor, typeHandler=strArrTypeHandler}, default, default, default, default )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where mname=#{mname} and email=#{email}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set pwd=#{pwd} where mid=#{mid}
